# 39th Golden Bell Awards

The 39th Golden Bell Awards (Mandarin:第39屆金鐘獎) was held on November 26, 2004, at the Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hall, Taipei, Taiwan. The ceremony was broadcast live by EBC.
